subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: Bethpage Black in Farmingdale, N.Y., on Long Island, will host the 2019 P.G.A. Championship and the 2024 Ryder Cup.
snippet: Bethpage Black in Farmingdale, N.Y., on Long Island, will host the 2019 P.G.A. Championship and the 2024 Ryder Cup.
